channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Iran crisis live: foreign minister says country ready for negotiations but also ‘fully prepared for war’
item.description: Abbas Araghchi warns adversaries against ‘miscalculation’ as Trump mulls military response to protest crackdown ‘The streets are full of blood’: Irani...

item.title: ‘Hundreds more’ ICE agents due in Minnesota after killing of Renee Good – US politics live
item.description: Kristi Noem says that more officers are being deployed amid protests in several cities The widespread outcry over Renee Good’s killing led to more pro...

item.title: US will have Greenland ‘one way or the other’, says Trump – Europe live
item.description: US president repeats his desire for the territory as he mocks its defences as ‘two dog sleds’ and shrugs off impact on Nato Former German vice-chancel...

item.title: Former Tory chancellor Nadhim Zahawi says UK is ‘sick’ as he defects to Reform UK – politics live
item.description: Nigel Farage reveals convert to party as former chancellor says UK ‘has reached a dark and dangerous chapter’ Zahawi says he accepts that the Conserva...

item.title: Trump weighs ‘very strong’ military options against Iran as death toll of protesters climbs | First Thing
item.description: US president claims ‘Iran wants to negotiate’ as rights groups report that regime’s crackdown on protest has killed hundreds. Plus, how Grok’s nudific...

item.title: He once criticised African leaders who cling to power. Now he wants a seventh term
item.description: Yoweri Museveni, 81, says he has brought stability to Uganda. His critics complain of political oppression.

item.title: Watch: Moment skier and dog swept along by avalanche
item.description: Footage recorded by Spanish skier Ares Masip shows the incident on Pic de l'Hortell, a mountain in Andorra.

item.title: Ofcom investigates Elon Musk's X over Grok AI sexual deepfakes
item.description: The watchdog said it had received reports of the platform's Grok AI chatbot creating undressed images of people.

item.title: Cascarino earring a 'schoolgirl error' - Williams
item.description: Fara Williams says West Ham's Estelle Cascarino made a "schoolgirl error" by being denied a debut because she could not remove an earring.

item.title: Former Tory chancellor Nadhim Zahawi defects to Reform UK
item.description: Zahawi was a Conservative MP and served as chancellor under Boris Johnson.
